label: 禅林寺殿
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: What is now Fukuchi-chō, Nanzenji, Sakyō-ku, Kyoto; converted into a Zen temple in 1291. Renamed Nanzenji around the beginning of the fourteenth century; now the headquarters temple of the Nanzenji branch, Rinzai sect. [南禅寺　左京区　福地町　臨済宗]
